highlights: Contributed to development and support of scalable .NET (C#) applications with focus on robust architecture and maintenance.
Collaborated in agile teams to analyze, implement, and deploy software solutions.
Ensured code quality via reviews and adherence to industry best practices and standards.
Built responsive web interfaces using React.js.
Integrated backend services with Dockerized REST APIs.
Enhanced UX with GSAP-based dynamic animations.
Architected and deployed high-performance web solutions using the MERN stack.
Achieved ~100% traffic growth through performance optimizations.
Implemented responsive design, cutting load time by ~50% and boosting engagement by ~40%.

projects.name: Neural Network Implementation from Scratch
projects.summary: Implemented a neural network from scratch; processed MNIST; used Eigen for matrix ops; optimized with parallelism.

projects.name: AI-Powered Telegram Chatbot with LLM Integration
projects.summary: Lightweight chatbot integrating TinyLlama; customizable architecture; tunable for manufacturing use cases.

projects.name: GPU-Accelerated SPH Fluid Simulation
projects.summary: SPH fluid simulation from scratch; accelerated on NVIDIA GPUs with CUDA for real-time performance.
